sen.j: 大和大路通（やまとおおじどおり）は、京都市の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Yamato-oji-dori Street is a north-south running street in Kyoto City.
The Yamato-oji-dori Street is a street running north-south in Kyoto City.
The Yamato-oji-dori Street is a street running north-south in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北は三条通から南は泉涌寺道（一橋小学校の南側の道）まで。
sen.e: It runs from the Sanjo-dori Street in the north to the Sennyuji-michi (a road south of Ikkyo Elementary School) in the south.
It runs from Sanjo-dori Street in the north to Sennyuji-michi (a road south of Ikkyo Elementary School) in the south.
It runs from Sanjo-dori Street in the north to Sennyuji-michi (a road south of Ikkyo Elementary School) in the south.

sen.j: かつての奈良街道の一部にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the former Nara-kaido Road.
It corresponds to the former Nara-kaido Road.
It corresponds to the former Nara-kaido Road.

sen.j: 四条通以北は縄手通（縄手＝鴨川 (淀川水系)の土手）と呼ばれる。
sen.e: The section north of the Shijo-dori Street is called Nawate-dori Street (Nawate--a bank of the Kamo-gawa River (the Yodo-gawa water system)).
The section north of Shijo-dori Street is called Nawate-dori Street (Nawate--a bank of the Kamo-gawa River (the Yodo-gawa water system)).
The section north of Shijo-dori Street is called Nawate-dori Street (Nawate--a bank of the Kamo-gawa River (the Yodo-gawa water system)).
